p:
On the strength of the inverse relationship between YoY density and area of thermally suitable habitat, we generated two additional indices of YoY abundance, which extrapolate YoY density over areas of a thermally suitable seabed in different ways. The first assumes uniform settlement across depths shallower than 50 m (Wahle, Bergeron, et al., 2013; see above). In this case, extrapolated recruitment, R, was taken as the product of YoY settlement density, ρ , from shallow diver‐sampled locations and the area, A, of thermally suitable sea bed subject to temperatures >12°C:
R = ρ ∗ A .
